title: The Stanislaski Brothers: Mikhail and Alex
description: Roberts delivers a special collection with two complete novels about the tempestuous and tantalizing Stanislaski brothers. Mikhail's rare talents attract a wealthy and classy beauty in Luring a Lady. In Convincing Alex, Alex mistakenly arrests a headstrong woman who decides the sexy detective is perfect for her research on cops. Satellite media tour.
author: Nora Roberts
